mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, pw, name, nick_name, email, birth, gender, pic, country_code, phone, mbti, caption, grade) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick_name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{pic}, #{country_code}, #{phone}, #{mbti}, #{caption}, #{grade});
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw=#{pw} WHERE id = #{id}
